        Returns:
        true if valid chains found at this site

      • validateChains

        public void validateChains(Skeleton skel)
        If another collision has been evaluated at teh same height, this method checks for any changes in the Corners involved in a skeleton. This is a problem when several collisions at the same height occur against one smash edge. If the chain has length > 1, then the lost corner can be recorvered using the following corner (the corners central to the collision, every one after the first will all remain valid at one height). If the chain has length 1, we're in for a bit of a trek. We can skip the finding edges part if the current height only has one collision?
        Parameters:
        skel -
